title: LF CLASH TEAM WITH FOCUS ON WINNING GOLD/PLAT ELO (mid/top)
body:
lf clash team with winning mentality, i have won 2 clash tournaments in tier 4 and 3 and have competed in tier 2 going 1-1, i want a serious team that is looking to play outside of clash and i,prove. 

Add me Uzuwu

replies.body: xerath sup 1tp. very keen to play clash
